about_the_game:
Roguelike-deck builder meets city builder, Downtown Dealers challenges you to create a city and complete a series of challenges, using a deck that is uniquely customised with each run. Cards and objectives are randomised, requiring you to adapt to any situation and balance your deck for the always-changing challenges.

Welcome to Downtown Shuffle

Downtown Shuffle is an alternate game mode with more variation and challenge. You start with a random deck and battle your way through unique rivals, each with their own unique cards and mechanics. You're an unwelcome guest in their city, so they'll do anything to get you fired!

Build Your Deck

Buildings, upgrades, city-wide effects, and more. What cards will you choose for your city?

From luxury apartments to humble shops, build a city from a wide variety of buildings, each with effects that interact in unique ways. Try out different combinations of buildings to find powerful synergies and create a deck that matches your desired playstyle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Roguelike-deck builder meets city builder, Downtown Dealers challenges you to create a city and battle it out against rival city planners. Using a deck that is uniquely customised with each run, cards and objectives are randomised, requiring you to adapt to all situations!
